data.text: Faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nui ɠa ɗa ɓizɛ, anɛɛ ni nu la kpɛɛzu,
Siɛgi zu kpakagi la zooi zu, kundiɠila ɠaiziɛ nuiti ta ɗa mɔin.
Zunui é ga bala nui, é maawɔin nuiti maanɔɠɔzu,
Niiti ti ɠɛlɛzu GALA ná-tɔgi ʋa, naati ta ɗa faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nuiti maamusɛ,
Niiti ti ɓɔɠɔ veezu faa ɲɔi ya, naati ti la sɔle fai tanɔpɛ gaaɠaazu,
Fizɔgɛ nu ɠɛ ga bala nui, è ɗa ziɛ sɔledai zu,
Zɔi é ɠolozu GALA ná-tɔgi ʋɛ, doun zunu ɠana keleɠelegai,
Zɔi é ná-sɔlɔɔgi maamɔinzu ga talama walii, nii dateʋegai,
Ni nu a ʋoluavena, ga é mina woilo GALA ná-tɔ gooi ma,
Zɔi é telebo nuiti kakasu, é ti ʋilɛ pele ɲɔi ma,
Kpɛtɛ nui ɠeleɠelegɛ ɓɔɠɔ nɔ ɠaazu,
Siɛgi zu telebo nuiti ti kundiɠilai zɔlɔɔsu da, lɛbiya ɠa ɗa ɠɛ lee ɛsɛ pɛ bɛ.
Zɔi é ná-tɔ koloɠologiti dɔɔɠuzu, naa la ɠula ɓɔɠɔ numa,
Undaanɛ nu ɠa ga naama nui, nii yeenɔpɛ é luazu faa ɲɔi ɠɛɛ vai ʋa,
Ʋelei zalai la, é zikɔzu, ta filɛ zuai pului ma,
Kundiɠii a ʋalana ɠigi ma, toɠa ɗa telebotalai wola ɠɛ,
Nui nii nu ʋaa vai ziimaʋɛ, toɠa ɗa ɓizɛ ga lia ná-kabayeɠei ʋɔ pelei,
Nu-o-nu nii siɛ ʋelei zɔlegai, naa ɠa kizogi zɔlɔɔ,
Zɔi é ná-tii ɠɛɛzu, naa ɠa daamianigi zɔlɔɔ ga bɔɔlɔa,
Nui é ga lada nui, zee laa ɠa ve ga tuyai,
É la vizɔni ga nu zeelɔzɔɠɔzui ɠɛ nuɓusɛiti zɔɠɔzu,
Zunui é ga gaazuɠulapɔ nui, toɠa ɗa kpɛtɛi ɠaiziɛ ga gaazuvilɛi,
Zɔi é zelii losu seiɲɔɠɔi ma, gaaɓelasu naa ɠa ɗa ná-faanɛɛi wuuɠwɛɛ,
Nu-o-nu é kaazu ga faa ɲɔu laade, ga é kɛɛɠɛ ta dee maavo,
Zunui nii sɔlɔɔgi la ziilɛiɗa, toɠa ɗa kpɔɛi wuzeɠe,
Ɗɛi è laazu ɗa-ɠigaiziɛiti nɔ la, ɗa ga ɠimalala nu,
Zɔi é faanɛɛi ɠɛɛzu bala nuiti bɛ, é la yɛga kpala zu,
Siɛgi zu faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nuiti ti zeizu la kundiɠilai zu, ɛsɛ pɛ ka ɗa lɔɔɠu,
